pageTitle: Soft Joie Shey Button Down Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 22in / 56cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Bottom layer sold separately. Made in the USA. Dry clean. Shell: 100% rayon. Fabric: Fine knit. A striped button-down top from Soft Joie, detailed with a fold-over collar. Button-tabs gather the cuffs, converting the sleeves from 3/4 to elbow length. Description Soft Joie > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Launched in spring 2010, Soft Joie follows Joie's philosophy of casual, comfortable luxury, drawing inspiration from the main line's effortlessly chic aesthetic and the casual yet sophisticated Southern California lifestyle. Crafted using the highest quality fabrics, each piece is both easy to wear and on-trend, striking the perfect balance between comfort and style. With signature Joie favorites and sophisticated basics, this collection is sure to become a staple in every chic woman's wardrobe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy.
